messages.message: Hey Team, I’ve been getting Access Denied with deployed solutions API when accessing via org sharing (I tested chatbots). This is only happening in crafting and not on other environments. The error is coming from GRPC endpoint (`CheckOrgLevelSolutionSharingAccess`) where it checks access for org sharing. Does anyone know what might be happening here? I saw some db migrations but not sure if that’s causing it. @Xindi Xu do you know since you added some permissions checks recently?

This accessor still uses the `user_active_org` table, and we should update it.
cc @Pridhvi Vegesna

@Pridhvi Vegesna Can we update this similar to what you have here?
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71488
Nice catch, working on the update

@Pridhvi Vegesna I see that you created this ticket https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CS-6361. I created another one https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CS-6362

Would you want to take both, or do you want me to take them
I'm working on both of them rnow, I'll take both of them
